**Please Tell Us About Your Service Experience! ----------------------------------------------------
Hi {{{Case.SuppliedName}}},
Thanks for trusting us with your business! We'd love to hear about your recent customer support experience.
We hope you'd be willing to take ten seconds to complete a one-question survey.
Just click the button below.
Take the one-question survey! < https://delighted.com/t/LYpbg6EP?caseNumber=%7B%7B%7BCase.CaseNumber%7D%7D%7D&email=%7B%7B%7BCase.SuppliedEmail%7D%7D%7D&RepId=%7B%7B%7BCase.OwnerId%7D%7D%7D&RepRole=%7B%7B%7BCase.Owners_Role__c%7D%7D%7D >
